main event: A sighting of a white object the size of a dime flying with the curvature of the earth for 2 to 3 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only two to three seconds.,The object was observed flying along the curvature of the earth.,Only one object was reported.,The case was determined to possibly be a meteorite.,The observation was categorized as ground-visual.
sighted object: one white object the size of a dime
